title: The degeneration of a family of rational surface automorphisms
abstract:
We consider a one-dimensional family of rational surfaces with automorphisms.
In a degeneration of this family, the limiting map is the identity map on a
special fiber. We check that the map on the total space of the family has
indeterminacy in the special fiber. However, we show that after blowing-up at
an indeterminate curve, there is an induced birational map on the exceptional
divisor over the indeterminate curve. Moreover, we show that this map has
dynamical degree 16.
